hackathon-description-text: Seeking individuals of all expertise levels to collaborate in a 24-hour research and development blitz. Centered around trending technologies in the architecture, engineering, construction, and commercial real estate development industry, this event will highly encourage cross-pollination of ideas and provide exposure to new skills not encountered in practice. Start thinking about potential project ideas and come prepared to roll up your sleeves alongside talented colleagues.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Chief Enabling Officer, Tocci Building Co.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: - interoperability: complexity and/or frequency of migration across software platforms
- can easily be put into practice in the industry

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=64 Pleasant St, Watertown, MA 02472, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: value in failure as much as success
coding, software expertise, user experience, graphics, delivery

hackathon-description-header: How do you want to evolve the AEC industry?
